# Allow all crawlers
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow certain areas
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /signup
Disallow: /profile
Disallow: /forgot-password
Disallow: /payment-methods
Disallow: /subscription
Disallow: /cancel-subscription
Disallow: /account/update-password
Disallow: /auth/confirm
Disallow: /listing

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://pepsource.shop/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://pepsource.shop/sitemap.html
